common.DisclaimerText: By proceeding, I agree that I have read and understood the Terms & Conditions of usage of 247 and consent to the same. I am voluntarily availing of the services provided on this platform. I am fully aware that I will not be undergoing a physical examination by a physician prior to a physician recommending  medical tests and/or treatment and/or the prescribing of OTC drugs. I am also aware that  the consultation on 247 Application does not preclude my rights to visit a physician and opt for a physical examination at any point in time and I am free at any time during the consultation to request for the same.

TnC: The HealthyLife offering is the marketing program offered by Apollo 24|7, an app managed by Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Limited (AHEL) only for HDFC Bank customers.
The validity of membership is 1 year and the validity of program (“Term”) is till 30th September 2021, unless extended by Apollo 24|7 and HDFC Bank
The discounts/offers applicable as per the HealthyLife program shall be applied at the time of payment checkout by the customer.

This program is designed for select HDFC current and saving accounts customers and offerings will vary with the different categories of accounts of HDFC customers. However, membership schemes can be upgraded / downgraded on the basis of the spending on the Apollo 24|7 app or web as mentioned in the offer grid.
The HealthyLife Program is open to all HDFC current and saving accounts customers with a valid Indian mobile number registered with HDFC bank only.

The T&C’s of the OneApollo silver, gold and platinum membership offered in the HealthyLife program shall be governed by the terms & conditions of the website - https://www.oneapollo.com/terms-conditions/

The HealthyLife offering will be applicable to all Current & Savings Account holders of HDFC Bank, whether they are existing customers of Apollo 24|7 or not. However, all the customers shall adhere to the terms and conditions as mentioned in this marketing program.
The HealthyLife program membership is non-transferable.

HealthyLife Benefits Unlock condition - The activation of the benefits for the HealthyLife program will be completed 24 hours post the service delivery/fulfilment of the qualifying transaction. For e.g., to unlock benefits, the user is needed to make a qualifying transaction of amount subject to change as per different tiers.

By enrolling for the HealthyLife program, a member consents to allow use and disclosure by Apollo Health centres,of his/her personal and other information as provided by the member at the time of enrolment and/or subsequently.

As a prerequisite to becoming a member, a customer will need to provide mandatory information including full name, valid and active Indian mobile number. He/she shall adhere to such terms and conditions as may be prescribed for membership from time to time.
The HealthyLife membership program will be issued solely at the discretion of the management and the final discretion on all matters relating to the membership shall rest with Apollo 24|7(AHEL).
Apollo 24|7 reserves the right to add, alter, amend and revise terms and conditions as well as rules and regulations governing the HealthyLife membership program without prior notice.

Benefits and offers available through the program may change or be withdrawn without prior intimation. Apollo 24|7 will not be responsible for any liability arising from such situations or use of such offers.

Any disputes arising out of the offer shall be subject to arbitration by a sole arbitrator appointed by Apollo 24|7 for this purpose. The proceedings of the arbitration shall be conducted as per the provisions of Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996. The place of arbitration shall be at Chennai and language of arbitration shall be English. The existence of a dispute, if at all, shall not constitute a claim against Apollo 24|7

TnC: Circle is the marketing program offered by Apollo 24/7, a digital platform managed by Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Limited (AHEL)
The validity of the program (“Term”) will be as per the plan selected by the customer.
The discounts offered under Circle program shall be applied at the time of payment checkout by the customer.
The offerings under the program will vary with the different categories under it.
The Circle program is non-transferable.
The activation of the benefits for the Circle program will be completed 24 hours post the service delivery/fulfillment of the qualifying transaction.

By enrolling for the Circle program, a member consents to allow use and disclosure of his/her personal and other information as provided by the member at the time of enrolment and/or upto subsequently by Apollo Hospitals Group

As a prerequisite to becoming a member, a customer is required to provide mandatory information including full name, valid and active Indian mobile number. He/she shall be governed by such terms and conditions as may be prescribed for membership from time to time.
The Circle membership program will be issued solely at the discretion of the management and the final discretion on all matters relating to the membership shall rest with Apollo 24/7(AHEL).
Apollo 24/7 reserves the right to add, alter, amend and revise terms and conditions without prior notice and intimation.

Benefits and offers available through the program may change or be withdrawn without prior intimation. Apollo 24/7 will not be responsible for any liability arising from such situations or use of such offers.

Any disputes arising out of the program shall be subject to arbitration by a sole arbitrator appointed by Apollo 24/7 for this purpose. The proceedings of the arbitration shall be conducted as per the provisions of Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996. The place of arbitration shall be at Chennai and language of arbitration shall be English. The existence of a dispute, if at all, shall not constitute a claim against Apollo 24/7.

FAQ.faqQuestion: What is the Apollo 24|7 CIRCLE Membership program?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Apollo 24|7 CIRCLE membership is a one-of-its-kind program designed to give the best care and value to its members. Once you sign up by choosing the plan that suits your needs, you will receive benefits like an emergency doctor-on-call, cashback on medicines, discounts on doctor consultations, and diagnostics. Did we also tell you that all your deliveries will be done free of cost and on a priority basis?

FAQ.faqQuestion: Sounds good. Tell me more about the plans?
FAQ.faqAnswer: There are 3 plans available for you to choose from: INR 49 for 2 months, INR 249 for 6 months, and INR 349 for 12 months.

FAQ.faqQuestion: How Do I Sign Up for a Circle Membership?
FAQ.faqAnswer: It’s simple! If you’re a part of Apollo 24|7 already, you can click on the link above and sign up. If you’re new to Apollo 24|7, download the app today and get started.

FAQ.faqQuestion: Is annual membership better than the monthly membership?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Yes, if you’re big on savings! The yearly membership only costs you INR 349, which translates to INR 29 per month!

FAQ.faqQuestion: Can I buy Circle Membership using my health credits?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Yes, you can! If you have Health Credits that equal the price of the membership. If not, you can always pay via our easy payment methods.

FAQ.faqQuestion: Where will I get the Circle cashback?
FAQ.faqAnswer: You will be eligible for Circle cashback every time you buy medicines or Apollo products. We also have discounts on selected doctor consultations and diagnostic tests. Cashback will be credited to your OneApollo Health Credits as soon as a transaction gets completed.

FAQ.faqQuestion: How can I use Circle cashback?
FAQ.faqAnswer: You can use your Circle cashback as Health Credits to buy medicines and Apollo branded products on Apollo 24|7

FAQ.faqQuestion: Can I cancel Circle membership after purchasing it?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Circle membership is non-refundable, however you can contact us using the Need Help section in My Account and we will try our best to help you out.

FAQ.faqQuestion: Can the offers change after I buy the membership?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Yes, it’s possible but we will always aim to upgrade benefits so that you get the best out of your Circle membership

FAQ.faqQuestion: What does Circle Cashback mean? Is it different from One Apollo Cashback?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Every time you make a transaction through Circle, you will be rewarded with Circle Cashback that you can use to purchase medicines and Apollo-branded products. It’s the same as OneApollo Cashback.

FAQ.faqQuestion: Can Circle cashback be used to pay for a Virtual Consultation?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Not yet, but you can use your Circle cashback as Health Credits to re-order medicines or any healthcare products from Apollo 247.
The URLife Program will be available on Circle soon. Stay tuned!

FAQ.faqQuestion: Will some of these features be part of the Apollo Hospital experience as well?
FAQ.faqAnswer: Not as of now, but we are working towards it so you get the best out of Circle

vaccineBooking.select_preferred_date_for_getting_vaccin: Select the preferred date for getting vaccinated?
vaccineBooking.dose_2_info: *Dose 2 auto selected. Based on Dose 1 selection
vaccineBooking.slot_will_be_conveyed_before: Slot will be conveyed 24 hours before date of vaccination
vaccineBooking.name_of_the_paient_to_be_vaccinated: Name of the person to be vaccinated
vaccineBooking.request_submission_failed_message_1: Booking couldn't be done. Please try again.
vaccineBooking.confirm_message: We have taken your request and will confirm your booking in 24 - 48 hours.
vaccineBooking.time_slot_info: *Time slot for vaccination will be conveyed 24 hours before the date of vaccination
vaccineBooking.no_sites_in_city: Oops ! no available site in selected city
vaccineBooking.no_vaccination_booking: No Vaccination booking has been made for you or your family.
vaccineBooking.resend_confirmation_message: In case this booking is for another family member you can send an SMS to their phone number here:
vaccineBooking.profile_selection_info: Only 1 active appointment is allowed per user. If you are looking to reschedule, please cancel the existing appointment and book again.
vaccineBooking.no_vaccination_sites_available: Currently, Vaccination sites  are not available for this city or vaccine type. Kindly select another city or vaccine type.
vaccineBooking.no_slots_available: There are no available slots for this vaccination location. Kindly select another location.
vaccineBooking.no_date_slots_available: Please choose a date to see the available slots.
vaccineBooking.cowin_enroll_text: We do not have vaccine benefits enabled for your company. You can click on the button below to book a vaccination slot on CoWin. If you believe that you should be able to book, please raise a concern through your HR/Benefits team
vaccineBooking.retail_customer_cowin_text: For booking vaccination as a regular Apollo247 user, click below:
vaccineBooking.retail_customer_corporate_text: If your corporate has tied up with Apollo please click below to enrol for Corporate Vaccination
vaccineBooking.tnc_subheading: Please read all of our terms and conditions before doing anything.
vaccineBooking.tnc_subtext_1: Apollo 24|7  Covid – 19 Vaccination Program registration and covered services are voluntary in nature.
vaccineBooking.tnc_subtext_2: On accepting to proceed with the Apollo 24|7 Covid – 19 vaccination program, I agree and give my consent to the following:
tnc_content: To receive/administer for myself the COVID – 19 vaccine, which is being facilitated by Apollo.
To voluntarily availing the Covid-19 vaccination out of my own free will, consent and risk and this is not being administered under duress, coercion or as an employment condition.
To assume full responsibility for taking the vaccination and for any reactions/ side effects/ contingency/consequences whatsoever arising from administering the vaccination.

To acknowledge and understand that Apollo makes no warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose regarding the vaccine or its effectiveness.

That I, for myself and my heirs, administrators, trustees, executors, assigns and successors in interest do hereby agree to release and hold harmless Apollo, its subsidiaries, affiliates, assigns, officers, employees, volunteers and agents from and against any and all contingencies, consequences, demands, damages, losses, costs, expenses, obligations, liabilities, claims, actions and cause of action (whether any of which is groundless or otherwise) of any nature whatsoever (including, without limitation, reasonable attorney’s fees and court costs) by reason of or resulting, in any way, from any and all acts, accidents, events, occurrences, omissions and the like related to, or arising out of, directly or indirectly, my receiving this COVID-19 vaccine.
vaccineBooking.tnc_error: Without agreeing to the Terms and Conditions, you’ll not be able to register for vaccination. For any other query, please raise your issue in the help section.
vaccineBooking.instruction_heading: INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE DAY OF VACCINATION
vaccineBooking.instruction_sub_heading: Show this QR code or the Booking ID at the vaccination centre along with the following original documents:
vaccineBooking.govt_guidlines_text_1: As per government guidelines, it is mandatory to REGISTER yourself on CoWIN platform as well.
vaccineBooking.govt_guidlines_text_2: You only need to register on CoWIN and share the registration ID at the Vaccination Centre
vaccineBooking.govt_guidlines_text_3: Booking a slot is not required as you already have a confirmed slot with us.
vaccineBooking.not_eligible_for_corporate_benefits: Given email ID is not eligible for corporate benefits. If you believe that this is not right, please raise a concern through your HR team.
vaccineBooking.sent_an_otp: We have sent an OTP to your corporate email id. Please also check your spam folder, in case you don't see it in inbox.
vaccineBooking.not_able_sent_otp: We are not able to send OTP to the given email ID. Please try again after some time. If this issue persists, send an email to corporate-helpdesk@apollo247.com and attach the screenshot of this error.
vaccineBooking.benefit_activated: Your company benefit package has been activated. Please click below to access the same.
vaccineBooking.wrong_otp: Seems you have entered wrong OTP.Please try with right one.
vaccineBooking.unable_to_validate: We are unable to validate OTP right now. Please try again after some time. If this issue persists, send an email to corporate-helpdesk@apollo247.com and attach the screenshot of this error.
vaccineBooking.dose_2_alert: Please make sure that the difference between 1st and 2nd dose is as per Govt. guidelines. If difference in 2nd dose is less than Govt. guideline, you will not be given 2nd dose.

consultPayment.receiveCallText: You will receive a call from the doctor on the Apollo247 App.
consultPayment.stepOne: Join Consult Room and upload your medical records
consultPayment.stepOneSubheading: * Reschedule & Cancellation allowed upto 15 mins prior to the appointment time.
consultPayment.stepTwo:
Consultation with Doctor via audio/video call.
Access your prescription in the Consult Room.
consultPayment.stepThree: If required, share necessary reports and text updates.
consultPayment.medicineNote: Seamlessly, order here your medicines and get deliveries in 2 hours. Also, same day home sample collection facility available for tests prescribed. T&C Apply.
